item.title: Kindness
item.description: Dear Amy, What is one of the most important considerations when engaging with someone in a difficult conversation? When everything within you wants to make your point, to justify yourself with great vigour? When you have waited for so long and the time is now? The fruit of the Spirit is … kindness â€• Galatians 5:22 How easy this is to overlook. Could I be overstating its importance though? I think not.
